register.title: Sign up and receive a free class!

promos.p_one: Fluency in a language comes with dedicated effort and confidence. Our individual training will allow you to feel comfortable and confident while progressing in life and total comprehension of your target language.
promos.p_two: Our goal is your immediate success in learning your target language, but also success and satisfaction throughout your entire life.
promos.p_three: You will have opportunity to connect with people from different countries, cultures, and walks of life. You will make connections that will change your life!

para_one.title: Classroom Locations
para_one.sub_one: Personalized Help Just for Your Needs!
para_one.sub_two: Always Find Time to Improve Yourself!
para_one.sub_three: Make New Friends, and Gain Confidence!
para_one.sub_four: Achieve Fluency Quickly, Acomplish More Daily!

para_two.sub_one: Select class times that work for you!
para_two.sub_three: Design custom lessons that will always be interesting!
